   21: 
   22: -module(ttb_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -compile(export_all).
   25: %% Test functions
   26: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   27: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   28: 	 file/1,file_no_pi/1,file_fetch/1,wrap/1,wrap_merge/1,
   29: 	 wrap_merge_fetch_format/1,write_config1/1,write_config2/1,
   30: 	 write_config3/1,history/1,write_trace_info/1,seq_trace/1,
   31: 	 diskless/1,otp_4967_1/1,otp_4967_2/1]).
   32: -export([init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: -export([foo/0]).
   34: 
   35: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   36: 
   37: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   38: -define(OUTPUT, "handler_output").
   39: -define(FNAME, "temptest").
   40: -define(DIRNAME, "ddtemp").
   41: 
   42: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
   43:     Dog=test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
   44:     ttb:stop(),
   45:     rm(?OUTPUT),
   46:     [rm(Upload) || Upload<-filelib:wildcard("ttb_upload*")],
   47:     rm(?DIRNAME),
   48:     [rm(At) || At <- filelib:wildcard("*@*")],
   49:     rm("ttb_last_config"),
   50:     %% Workaround for bug(?) in test_server - if the test case fails
   51:     %% with a timetrap timeout, then end_per_testcase will run with
   52:     %% faulty group_leader - which in turn makes test_server:stop_node
   53:     %% hang (stop_node is called by most of the cleanup functions).
   54:     %% Therefore we do the cleanup before each testcase instead - this
   55:     %% is obviously not 100% correct, but it will at least make sure
   56:     %% that the nodes which are to be started in a test case at are
   57:     %% terminated.
   58:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
   59:     catch error:undef -> ok
   60:     end,
   61:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
   62: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   63:     %% try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
   64:     %% catch error:undef -> ok
   65:     %% end,
   66:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
   67:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
   68:     ok.
   69: 
   70: suite() -> [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]}].
   71: 
   72: all() -> 
   73:     [file, file_no_pi, file_fetch, wrap, wrap_merge,
   74:      wrap_merge_fetch_format, write_config1, write_config2,
   75:      write_config3, history, write_trace_info, seq_trace,
   76:      diskless, diskless_wrap, otp_4967_1, otp_4967_2,
   77:      fetch_when_no_option_given, basic_ttb_run_ip_port, basic_ttb_run_file_port,
   78:      return_fetch_dir_implies_fetch, logfile_name_in_fetch_dir, upload_to_my_logdir,
   79:      upload_to_my_existing_logdir, fetch_with_options_not_as_list,
   80:      error_when_formatting_multiple_files_4393, format_on_trace_stop,
   81:      trace_to_remote_files_on_localhost_with_different_pwd,
   82:      trace_to_local_files_on_localhost_with_different_pwd,
   83:      trace_to_remote_files_on_localhost_with_different_pwd_abs,
   84:      changing_cwd_on_control_node, changing_cwd_on_remote_node,
   85:      changing_cwd_on_control_node_with_local_trace,
   86:      one_command_trace_setup, dbg_style_fetch, shell_tracing_init,
   87:      only_one_state_for_format_handler, only_one_state_with_default_format_handler,
   88:      only_one_state_with_initial_format_handler, run_trace_with_shortcut1,
   89:      run_trace_with_shortcut2, run_trace_with_shortcut3, run_trace_with_shortcut4,
   90:      cant_specify_local_and_flush, trace_sorted_by_default,disable_sorting,
   91:      trace_resumed_after_node_restart, trace_resumed_after_node_restart_ip,
   92:      trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap,
   93:      trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap_mult
   94: ].
   95: 
   96: groups() -> 
   97:     [].
   98: 
   99: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  100:     clean_priv_dir(Config),
  101:     Config.
  102: 
  103: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  104:     ok.
  105: 
  106: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  107:     Config.
  108: 
  109: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  110:     Config.
  111: 
  112: 
  113: file(suite) ->
  114:     [];
  115: file(doc) ->
  116:     ["Start tracing on multiple nodes, single file"];
  117: file(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     Node = node(),
  119:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  120:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  121:     S = self(),
  122:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  123:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"file"),
  124:     {ok,[Node]} =
  125: 	ttb:tracer(Node,[{file, File},
  126: 			 {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  127:     {ok,[{S,[{matched,Node,_}]}]} = ttb:p(S,call),
  128:     {ok,[OtherNode]} =
  129: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, File},
  130: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  131:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  132:     {ok,[]} = ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],
  133: 				  [{file, File},
  134: 				   {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  135:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  136:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  137:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  138:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  139:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-file")),
  140:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  141: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-file")),
  142: 
  143:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  144: 	   end_of_trace,
  145: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  146: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  147:     ok.
  148: 
  149: file(cleanup,_Config) ->
  150:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  151: 
  152: file_no_pi(suite) ->
  153:     [];
  154: file_no_pi(doc) ->
  155:     ["Start tracing on multiple nodes, single file, no process information"];
  156: file_no_pi(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  157:     Node = node(),
  158:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  159:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  160:     S = self(),
  161:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  162:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"file"),
  163:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  164: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, File},
  165: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}},
  166: 				     {process_info,false}]),
  167:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  168:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  169:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  170:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  171:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  172:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-file")),
  173:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  174: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-file")),
  175: 
  176:     [{trace_ts,LocalProc,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]}, {_,_,_}},
  177: 	   end_of_trace,
  178: 	   {trace_ts,RemoteProc,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  179: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  180:     true = is_pid(LocalProc),
  181:     true = is_pid(RemoteProc),
  182:     ok.
  183: 
  184: file_no_pi(cleanup,_Config) ->
  185:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  186: 
  187: 
  188: file_fetch(suite) ->
  189:     [];
  190: file_fetch(doc) ->
  191:     ["stop with the fetch option, i.e. collect all files when ttb is stopped"];
  192: file_fetch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  193:     Node = node(),
  194:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  195:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  196:     S = self(),
  197:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  198:     ThisDir = filename:join(Privdir,this),
  199:     ok = file:make_dir(ThisDir),
  200:     OtherDir = filename:join(Privdir,other),
  201:     ok = file:make_dir(OtherDir),
  202:     ThisFile = filename:join(ThisDir,"file_fetch"),
  203:     OtherFile = filename:join(OtherDir,"file_fetch"),
  204: 
  205:     %% I'm setting priv_dir as cwd, so ttb_upload directory is created there
  206:     %% and not in any other strange place!
  207:     {ok,Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  208:     ok = file:set_cwd(Privdir),
  209: 
  210:     {ok,[Node]} =
  211: 	ttb:tracer(Node,[{file, ThisFile},
  212: 			 {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  213:     {ok,[OtherNode]} =
  214: 	ttb:tracer([OtherNode],[{file, OtherFile},
  215: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  216:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  217:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  218:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  219:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  220:     test_server:capture_start(),
  221:     ttb:stop([return_fetch_dir]),
  222:     test_server:capture_stop(),
  223:     [StoreString] = test_server:capture_get(),
  224:     UploadDir =
  225: 	lists:last(string:lexemes(lists:flatten(StoreString),"$ \n")),
  226: 
  227:     %% check that files are no longer in original directories...
  228:     ok = check_gone(ThisDir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-file_fetch"),
  229:     ok = check_gone(ThisDir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-file_fetch.ti"),
  230: %    false = lists:member(TrcLog,ThisList),
  231: %    false = lists:member(TIFile,ThisList),
  232:     
  233:     {ok,OtherList} = file:list_dir(OtherDir),
  234:     false = lists:member(atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-file_fetch",OtherList),
  235:     false = lists:member(atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-file_fetch.ti",
  236: 			       OtherList),
  237:     
  238:     %% but instead in ttb_upload directory, where they can be formatted
  239:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(UploadDir,
  240: 					atom_to_list(Node)++"-file_fetch")),
  241:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(UploadDir,
  242: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-file_fetch")),
  243: 
  244:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  245: 	   end_of_trace,
  246: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  247: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  248: 
  249:     ok = file:set_cwd(Cwd),
  250:     ok.
  251: 
  252: file_fetch(cleanup,_Config) ->
  253:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  254: 
  255: 
  256: wrap(suite) ->
  257:     [];
  258: wrap(doc) ->
  259:     ["Start tracing on multiple nodes, wrap files"];
  260: wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  261:     Node = node(),
  262:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  263:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  264:     S = self(),
  265:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  266:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"wrap"),
  267:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  268: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, {wrap,File,200,3}},
  269: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  270:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  271:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  272:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  273:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  274:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  275:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  276:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  277:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  278:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  279:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  280: 					atom_to_list(Node)++"-wrap.*.wrp")),
  281:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  282: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  283: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  284: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  285:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  286: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-wrap.*.wrp")),
  287:     [{trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  288: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  289: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  290: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  291: 
  292:     %% Check that merge does not crash even if the timestamp flag is not on.
  293:     ok = ttb:format(
  294: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  295: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-wrap.*.wrp"),
  296: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  297: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-wrap.*.wrp")],[{disable_sort,true}]),
  298:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  299: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  300: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  301: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  302: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  303: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  304: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  305:     ok.
  306: 
  307: wrap(cleanup,_Config) ->
  308:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  309: 
  310: wrap_merge(suite) ->
  311:     [];
  312: wrap_merge(doc) ->
  313:     ["Start tracing on multiple nodes, wrap files, merge logs from both nodes"];
  314: wrap_merge(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  315:     Node = node(),
  316:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  317:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  318:     S = self(),
  319:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  320:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"wrap_merge"),
  321:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  322: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, {wrap,File,200,3}},
  323: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  324:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]}=ttb:p(all,[call,timestamp]),
  325:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  326:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  327:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  328:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  329:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  330:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  331:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  332:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  333:     ok = ttb:format(
  334: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  335: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-wrap_merge.*.wrp"),
  336: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  337: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-wrap_merge.*.wrp")]),
  338:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  339: 	   {trace_ts,_,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  340: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  341: 	   {trace_ts,_,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  342: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  343: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  344: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  345:     ok.
  346: 
  347: wrap_merge(cleanup,_Config) ->
  348:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  349: 
  350: 
  351: wrap_merge_fetch_format(suite) ->
  352:     [];
  353: wrap_merge_fetch_format(doc) ->
  354:     ["Start tracing on multiple nodes, wrap files, fetch and format at stop"];
  355: wrap_merge_fetch_format(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  356:     Node = node(),
  357:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  358:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  359:     S = self(),
  360:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  361:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"wrap_merge_fetch_format"),
  362: 
  363:     %% I'm setting priv_dir as cwd, so ttb_upload directory is created there
  364:     %% and not in any other strange place!
  365:     {ok,Cwd} = file:get_cwd(),
  366:     ok = file:set_cwd(Privdir),
  367: 
  368:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  369: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, {wrap,File,200,3}},
  370: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  371:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]}=ttb:p(all,[call,timestamp]),
  372:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  373:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  374:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  375:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  376:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  377:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  378:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  379:     ttb:stop([format]),
  380:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  381: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  382: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  383: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  384: 	   {trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  385: 	   {trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},_},
  386: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  387: 
  388:     ok = file:set_cwd(Cwd),
  389:     ok.
  390: 
  391: wrap_merge_fetch_format(cleanup,_Config) ->
  392:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  393: 
  394: write_config1(suite) ->
  395:     [];
  396: write_config1(doc) ->
  397:     ["Write config given commands"];
  398: write_config1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  399:     Node = node(),
  400:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  401:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  402:     S = self(),
  403: 
  404:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  405:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"write_config1"),
  406:     ok = ttb:write_config(File,
  407: 				[{ttb,tracer,[[Node,OtherNode],
  408: 					      [{file, File},
  409: 					       {handler,{fun myhandler/4,S}}]]},
  410: 				 {ttb,p,[all,call]},
  411: 				 {ttb,tp,[?MODULE,foo,[]]}]),
  412:     [_,_,_] = ttb:list_config(File),
  413:     ok = ttb:run_config(File),
  414:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  415:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  416:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  417:     ok = ttb:format(
  418: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  419: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config1"),
  420: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  421: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-write_config1")]),
  422:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  423: 	   {trace_ts,Other,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  424: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  425: 
  426:     case metatest(Other,OtherNode,Privdir,"-write_config1.ti") of
  427: 	{error,Reason} ->
  428: 	    timer:sleep(5000),
  429: 	    ok = ttb:format(
  430: 			 [filename:join(Privdir,
  431: 					atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config1"),
  432: 			  filename:join(Privdir,
  433: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++
  434: 					"-write_config1")]),
  435: 	    io:format("\nTrying again: ~p\n",[flush()]),
  436: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  437: 	ok ->
  438: 	    ok
  439:     end,	    
  440:     ok.
  441: 
  442: 
  443: write_config1(cleanup,_Config) ->
  444:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  445: 
  446: write_config2(suite) ->
  447:     [];
  448: write_config2(doc) ->
  449:     ["Write config from history (all)"];
  450: write_config2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  451:     Node = node(),
  452:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  453:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  454:     S = self(),
  455:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  456:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"write_config2"),
  457:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  458: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, File},
  459: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  460:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  461:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  462:     ok = ttb:write_config(File,all),
  463:     ttb:stop(),
  464:     [_,_,_] = ttb:list_config(File),
  465:     ok = ttb:run_config(File),
  466:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  467:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  468:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  469:     ok = ttb:format(
  470: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  471: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config2"),
  472: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  473: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-write_config2")]),
  474:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  475: 	   {trace_ts,Other,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  476: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  477: 
  478:     case metatest(Other,OtherNode,Privdir,"-write_config2.ti") of
  479: 	{error,Reason} ->
  480: 	    timer:sleep(5000),
  481: 	    ok = ttb:format(
  482: 			 [filename:join(Privdir,
  483: 					atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config2"),
  484: 			  filename:join(Privdir,
  485: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++
  486: 					"-write_config2")]),
  487: 	    io:format("\nTrying again: ~p\n",[flush()]),
  488: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  489: 	ok ->
  490: 	    ok
  491:     end,
  492:     ok.
  493: 
  494: write_config2(cleanup,_Config) ->
  495:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  496: 
  497: 
  498: write_config3(suite) ->
  499:     [];
  500: write_config3(doc) ->
  501:     ["Write config from history (selected and append)"];
  502: write_config3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  503:     Node = node(),
  504:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  505:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  506:     S = self(),
  507:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  508:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"write_config3"),
  509:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  510: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, File},
  511: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  512:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  513:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  514:     ok = ttb:write_config(File,[1,2]),
  515:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  516:     [_,_] = ttb:list_config(File),
  517:     ok = ttb:run_config(File),
  518:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  519:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  520:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  521:     ok = ttb:format(
  522: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  523: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config3"),
  524: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  525: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-write_config3")]),
  526:     [end_of_trace] = flush(), %foo is not traced
  527: 
  528:     ok = ttb:write_config(File,[{ttb,tp,[?MODULE,foo,[]]}],
  529: 			      [append]),
  530:     [_,_,_] = ttb:list_config(File),
  531:     ok = ttb:run_config(File),
  532:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  533:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  534:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  535:     ok = ttb:format(
  536: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,
  537: 				atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config3"),
  538: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  539: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-write_config3")]),
  540:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  541: 	   {trace_ts,Other,call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  542: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  543: 
  544:     case metatest(Other,OtherNode,Privdir,"-write_config3.ti") of
  545: 	{error,Reason} ->
  546: 	    timer:sleep(5000),
  547: 	    ok = ttb:format(
  548: 			 [filename:join(Privdir,
  549: 					atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_config3"),
  550: 			  filename:join(Privdir,
  551: 					atom_to_list(OtherNode)++
  552: 					"-write_config3")]),
  553: 	    io:format("\nTrying again: ~p\n",[flush()]),
  554: 	    ct:fail(Reason);
  555: 	ok ->
  556: 	    ok
  557:     end,
  558:     ok.
  559: 
  560: write_config3(cleanup,_Config) ->
  561:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).

  565: history(suite) ->
  566:     [];
  567: history(doc) ->
  568:     ["List history and execute entry from history"];
  569: history(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  570:     Node = node(),
  571:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  572:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  573:     S = self(),
  574: 
  575:     Nodes = [Node,OtherNode],
  576:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  577:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"history"),
  578:     StartOpts = [{file, File},
  579: 		       {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}],
  580:     {ok,[_,_]} = ttb:tracer(Nodes,StartOpts),
  581:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  582:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  583:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:ctp(?MODULE,foo),
  584:     [{1,{ttb,tracer,[Nodes,StartOpts]}},
  585: 	   {2,{ttb,p,[all,call]}},
  586: 	   {3,{ttb,tp,[?MODULE,foo,[]]}},
  587: 	   {4,{ttb,ctp,[?MODULE,foo]}}] = ttb:list_history(),
  588:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  589:     ok = ttb:run_history(3),
  590:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  591:     ok = ttb:run_history([3,4]),
  592:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  593:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  594:     ok = ttb:format(
  595: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-history"),
  596: 		  filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-history")]),
  597:     [{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  598: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  599:     ok.
  600: 
  601: history(cleanup,_Config) ->
  602:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).

  608:     ["Write trace info and give handler explicitly in format command"];
  609: write_trace_info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  610:     Node = node(),
  611:     {ok,OtherNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  612:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  613:     S = self(),
  614:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  615:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"write_trace_info"),
  616:     {ok,[_,_]} =
  617: 	ttb:tracer([Node,OtherNode],[{file, File},
  618: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  619:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,_,_},{matched,_,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  620:     {ok,[{matched,_,1},{matched,_,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  621:     ok = ttb:write_trace_info(mytraceinfo,fun() -> node() end),
  622:     ?MODULE:foo(),
  623:     rpc:call(OtherNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  624:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  625:     ok = ttb:format(
  626: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-write_trace_info"),
  627: 		  filename:join(Privdir,
  628: 				atom_to_list(OtherNode)++"-write_trace_info")],
  629: 		 [{handler,{fun otherhandler/4,S}}]),
  630:     [{{trace_ts,{S,_,Node},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},[Node]},
  631: 	   {{trace_ts,{_,_,OtherNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},[OtherNode]},
  632: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  633: 
  634:     ok.

  640: seq_trace(suite) ->
  641:     [];
  642: seq_trace(doc) ->
  643:     ["Test sequential tracing"];
  644: seq_trace(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  645:     S = self(),
  646: 
  647:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  648:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"seq_trace"),
  649:     {ok,[Node]} = ttb:tracer(node(),[{file,File},
  650: 				     {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  651:     {ok,[{new,[{matched,Node,0}]}]} = ttb:p(new,call),
  652:     {ok,[{matched,Node,1},{saved,1}]} =
  653: 	   ttb:tpl(?MODULE,seq,0,ttb:seq_trigger_ms(send)),
  654: 
  655:     Start = spawn(fun() -> seq() end),
  656:     timer:sleep(300),
  657:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  658:     ok = ttb:format(
  659: 		 [filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++"-seq_trace")]),
  660:     [{trace_ts,StartProc,call,{?MODULE,seq,[]},{_,_,_}},
  661:            {seq_trace,0,{send,{First, Seq0},StartProc,P1Proc,SpawnRequest1}},
  662:            {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq0, Seq1},P1Proc,StartProc,SpawnReply1}},
  663:            {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq2, Seq3},StartProc,P2Proc,SpawnRequest2}},
  664:            {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq3, Seq4},P2Proc,StartProc,SpawnReply2}},
  665: 	   {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq5, Seq6},StartProc,P1Proc,{Start,P2}}},
  666: 	   {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq6,  Seq7},P1Proc,P2Proc,{P1,Start}}},
  667: 	   {seq_trace,0,{send,{Seq7,  Last},P2Proc,StartProc,{P2,P1}}},
  668: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  669:     spawn_request = element(1, SpawnRequest1),
  670:     SReq1 = element(2, SpawnRequest1),
  671:     spawn_reply = element(1, SpawnReply1),
  672:     SReq1 = element(2, SpawnReply1),
  673:     spawn_request = element(1, SpawnRequest2),
  674:     SReq2 = element(2, SpawnRequest2),
  675:     spawn_reply = element(1, SpawnReply2),
  676:     SReq2 = element(2, SpawnReply2),
  677:     true = First < Seq0,
  678:     true = Seq0 < Seq1,
  679:     true = Seq1 < Seq2,
  680:     true = Seq2 < Seq3,
  681:     true = Seq4 < Seq5,
  682:     true = Seq6 < Seq7,
  683:     true = Seq7 < Last,
  684:    %% Additional test for metatrace
  685:     case StartProc of
  686: 	{Start,_,_} -> ok;
  687: 	Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
  688: 	    io:format("\n\nProcinfo was pid: ~p.\n"
  689: 		      "Should have been {Pid,Name,Node}\n",
  690: 		      [Pid]),
  691: 	    io:format("Trace information file:\n~p\n",
  692: 		      [ttb:dump_ti(
  693: 			 filename:join(Privdir,
  694: 				       atom_to_list(Node)++"-seq_trace.ti"))]),
  695: 	    ct:fail("metatrace failed for startproc")
  696:     end,
  697:     case P1Proc of
  698: 	{P1,_,_} -> ok;
  699: 	P1 when is_pid(P1) ->
  700: 	    io:format("\n\nProcinfo was pid: ~p.\n"
  701: 		      "Should have been {Pid,Name,Node}\n",
  702: 		      [P1]),
  703: 	    io:format("Trace information file:\n~p\n",
  704: 		      [ttb:dump_ti(
  705: 			 filename:join(Privdir,
  706: 				       atom_to_list(Node)++"-seq_trace.ti"))]),
  707: 	    ct:fail("metatrace failed for P1")
  708:     end,
  709:     case P2Proc of
  710: 	{P2,_,_} -> ok;
  711: 	P2 when is_pid(P2) ->
  712: 	    io:format("\n\nProcinfo was pid: ~p.\n"
  713: 		      "Should have been {Pid,Name,Node}\n",
  714: 		      [P2]),
  715: 	    io:format("Trace information file:\n~p\n",
  716: 		      [ttb:dump_ti(
  717: 			 filename:join(Privdir,
  718: 				       atom_to_list(Node)++"-seq_trace.ti"))]),
  719: 	    ct:fail("metatrace failed for P2")
  720:     end,
  721:     ok.
  722: 
  723: 
  724: diskless(suite) ->
  725:     [];
  726: diskless(doc) ->
  727:     ["Start tracing on diskless remote node"];
  728: diskless(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  729:     {ok,RemoteNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  730:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  731:     S = self(),
  732:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  733:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"diskless"),
  734:     {ok,[RemoteNode]} =
  735: 	ttb:tracer([RemoteNode],[{file, {local, File}},
  736: 				 {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  737:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,RemoteNode,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  738:     {ok,[{matched,RemoteNode,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  739: 
  740:     rpc:call(RemoteNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  741:     timer:sleep(5000), % needed for the IP port to flush
  742:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  743:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  744: 					atom_to_list(RemoteNode)++"-diskless")),
  745: 
  746:     [{trace_ts,{_,_,RemoteNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  747: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  748:     ok.
  749: 
  750: diskless(cleanup,_Config) ->
  751:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  752: 
  753: diskless_wrap(suite) ->
  754:     [];
  755: diskless_wrap(doc) ->
  756:     ["Start tracing on diskless remote node, save to local wrapped file"];
  757: diskless_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  758:     {ok,RemoteNode} = test_server:start_node(node2,slave,[]),
  759:     c:nl(?MODULE),
  760:     S = self(),
  761:     Privdir=priv_dir(Config),
  762:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"diskless"),
  763:     {ok,[RemoteNode]} =
  764: 	ttb:tracer([RemoteNode],[{file, {local, {wrap,File,200,3}}},
  765: 				 {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  766:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,RemoteNode,_}]}]} = ttb:p(all,call),
  767:     {ok,[{matched,RemoteNode,1}]} = ttb:tp(?MODULE,foo,[]),
  768: 
  769:     rpc:call(RemoteNode,?MODULE,foo,[]),
  770:     timer:sleep(5000), % needed for the IP port to flush
  771:     ttb:stop([nofetch]),
  772:     ok = ttb:format(filename:join(Privdir,
  773: 					atom_to_list(RemoteNode)++"-diskless.*.wrp")),
  774: 
  775:     [{trace_ts,{_,_,RemoteNode},call,{?MODULE,foo,[]},{_,_,_}},
  776: 	   end_of_trace] = flush(),
  777:     ok.
  778: 
  779: diskless_wrap(cleanup,_Config) ->
  780:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(node2)).
  781: 
  782: otp_4967_1(suite) ->
  783:     [];
  784: otp_4967_1(doc) ->
  785:     ["OTP-4967: clear flag"];
  786: otp_4967_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  787:     {ok,[Node]} = ttb:tracer(),
  788:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,Node,_}]}]} =  ttb:p(all,call),
  789:     {ok,[{all,[{matched,Node,_}]}]} =  ttb:p(all,clear),
  790:     stopped = ttb:stop(),
  791:     ok.
  792: 
  793: 
  794: otp_4967_2(suite) ->
  795:     [];
  796: otp_4967_2(doc) ->
  797:     ["OTP-4967: Trace message sent to {Name, Node}"];
  798: otp_4967_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  799:     io:format("1: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  800:     Privdir = priv_dir(Config),
  801:     io:format("2: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  802:     File = filename:join(Privdir,"otp_4967"),
  803:     io:format("3: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  804:     S = self(),
  805:     io:format("4: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  806:     {ok,[Node]} =
  807: 	ttb:tracer(node(),[{file, File},
  808: 			   {handler,{fun myhandler/4, S}}]),
  809: 
  810:     io:format("5: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  811:     %% Test that delayed registration of a process works.
  812:     receive after 200 -> ok end,
  813:     register(otp_4967,self()),
  814:     io:format("6: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  815:     {ok,[{S,[{matched,Node,1}]}]} =  ttb:p(self(),s),
  816:     io:format("7: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  817:     {otp_4967,node()} ! heihopp,
  818:     io:format("8: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  819:     stopped = ttb:stop([format]),
  820:     io:format("9: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  821:     Msgs = flush(),
  822:     io:format("10: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  823:     io:format("Messages received: \n~p\n",[Msgs]),
  824:     io:format("11: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  825:     true = lists:member(heihopp,Msgs), % the heihopp message itself
  826:     io:format("13: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  827:     {value,{trace_ts,_,send,heihopp,{_,otp_4967,Node},{_,_,_}}} =
  828: 	lists:keysearch(heihopp,4,Msgs), % trace trace of the heihopp message
  829:     io:format("14: ~p",[erlang:timestamp()]),
  830:     end_of_trace = lists:last(Msgs), % end of the trace
  831:     ok.
  832:     
  833: 
  834: myhandler(_Fd,Trace,_,Relay) ->
  835:     Relay ! Trace,
  836:     Relay.
  837: 
  838: simple_call_handler() ->
  839:     {fun(A, {trace_ts, _, call, _, _} ,_,_) -> io:format(A, "ok.~n", []);
  840: 	(A, {drop, N}, _, _) -> io:format(A, "{drop, ~p}.", [N]);
  841: 	(_, end_of_trace, _, _) -> ok end, []}.
  842: 
  843: marking_call_handler() ->
  844:     {fun(_, _, _, initial) -> file:write_file("HANDLER_OK", []);
  845: 	(_,_,_,_) -> ok end, initial}.
  846: 
  847: counter_call_handler() ->
  848:     {fun(_, {trace_ts, _, call, _, _} ,_,State) -> State + 1;
  849: 	(A, end_of_trace, _, State) -> io:format(A,"~p.~n", [State]) end, 0}.
  850: 
  851: ret_caller_call_handler() ->
  852:     {fun(A, {trace_ts, _, call, _, _, _} ,_,_) -> io:format(A, "ok.~n", []);
  853: 	(A, {trace_ts, _, return_from, _, _, _}, _, _) -> io:format(A, "ok.~n", []);
  854: 	(_, _, _, _) -> ok end, []}.
  855: 
  856: node_call_handler() ->
  857:     {fun(A, {trace_ts, {_,_,Node}, call, _, _} ,_,_) -> io:format(A, "~p.~n", [Node]);
  858: 	(_, end_of_trace, _, _) -> ok end, []}.
  859: 
  860: otherhandler(_Fd,_,end_of_trace,Relay) ->
  861:     Relay ! end_of_trace,
  862:     Relay;
  863: otherhandler(_Fd,Trace,TI,Relay) ->
  864:     {value,{mytraceinfo,I}} = lists:keysearch(mytraceinfo,1,TI),
  865:     Relay ! {Trace,I},
  866:     Relay.
  867: 
  868: flush() ->
  869:     flush([]).
  870: flush(Acc) ->
  871:     receive
  872: 	X ->
  873: 	    flush(Acc ++ [X])
  874:     after 1000 ->
  875: 	    Acc
  876:     end.
  877: 
  878: foo() ->
  879:     %% Sync between nodes is not always exact, so here is a little timeout to 
  880:     %% make sure traces come i correct sequence when merging.
  881:     %% In the real world there is no way to avoid this kind of trouble
  882:     timer:sleep(100),
  883:     foo_called.
  884: 
  885: 
  886: seq() ->
  887:     Fun = fun() -> timer:sleep(100),
  888: 		   receive {From,To} -> To ! {self(),From} end 
  889: 	  end,
  890:     P1 = spawn(Fun),
  891:     P2 = spawn(Fun),
  892:     P1 ! {self(),P2},
  893:     receive {P2,P1} -> ok end,
  894:     {P1,P2}.
  895: 
  896: %% Additional test for metatrace which might fail on OtherNode
  897: metatest(Proc,Node,Privdir,Filename) ->
  898:     case Proc of
  899: 	{_,_,Node} -> ok;
  900: 	Pid when is_pid(Pid) ->
  901: 	    io:format("\n\nProcinfo was pid: ~p.\n"
  902: 		      "Should have been {Pid,Name,Node}\n",
  903: 		      [Pid]),
  904: 	    io:format("Trace information file:\n~p\n",
  905: 		      [ttb:dump_ti(
  906: 			 filename:join(Privdir,atom_to_list(Node)++Filename))]),
  907: %	    ct:fail("metatrace failed on "++atom_to_list(Node))
  908: 	    {error,"metatrace failed on "++atom_to_list(Node)}
  909:     end.
  910: 
  911: check_gone(Dir,File) ->
  912:     {ok,List} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  913:     case lists:member(File,List) of
  914: 	      true -> 
  915: 		  timer:sleep(2000),
  916: 		  {ok,NewList} = file:list_dir(Dir),
  917: 		  case lists:member(File,NewList) of
  918: 		      true ->
  919: 			  io:format("~p: ~p~n",
  920: 				    [Dir,NewList]),
  921: 			  ct:fail(File ++ " not removed from original place");
  922: 		      false ->
  923: 			  io:format("gone after 2 sec....~n",[]),
  924: 			  ok
  925: 		  end;
  926: 	      false -> 
  927: 		  ok
  928: 	  end.
  929: 
  930: start_client_and_server() ->
  931:     {ok,ClientNode} = test_server:start_node(client,slave,[]),
  932:     ok = ttb_helper:c(code, add_paths, [code:get_path()]),
  933:     {ok,ServerNode} = test_server:start_node(server,slave,[]),
  934:     ok = ttb_helper:s(code, add_paths, [code:get_path()]),
  935:     ttb_helper:clear(),
  936:     {ServerNode, ClientNode}.
  937: 
  938: stop_client_and_server() ->
  939:     ClientNode = ttb_helper:get_node(client),
  940:     ServerNode = ttb_helper:get_node(server),
  941:     erlang:monitor_node(ClientNode,true),
  942:     erlang:monitor_node(ServerNode,true),
  943:     test_server:stop_node(ClientNode),
  944:     test_server:stop_node(ServerNode),
  945:     wait_for_client_and_server_stop(ClientNode,ServerNode).
  946: 
  947: wait_for_client_and_server_stop(undefined,undefined) ->
  948:     ok;
  949: wait_for_client_and_server_stop(ClientNode,ServerNode) ->
  950:     receive
  951: 	{nodedown,ClientNode} ->
  952: 	    erlang:monitor_node(ClientNode,false),
  953: 	    wait_for_client_and_server_stop(undefined,ServerNode);
  954: 	{nodedown,ServerNode} ->
  955: 	    erlang:monitor_node(ServerNode,false),
  956: 	    wait_for_client_and_server_stop(ClientNode,undefined)
  957:     end.
  958: 
  959: begin_trace(ServerNode, ClientNode, Dest) ->
  960:     {ok, _} =
  961: 	ttb:tracer([ServerNode,ClientNode],[{file, Dest}]),
  962:     ttb:p(all, call),
  963:     ttb:tp(server, received, []),
  964:     ttb:tp(client, put, []),
  965:     ttb:tp(client, get, []).
  966: 
  967: begin_trace_local(ServerNode, ClientNode, Dest) ->
  968:     {ok, _} =
  969: 	ttb:tracer([ServerNode,ClientNode],[{file, Dest}]),
  970:     ttb:p(all, call),
  971:     ttb:tpl(server, received, []),
  972:     ttb:tpl(client, put, []),
  973:     ttb:tpl(client, get, []).
  974: 
  975: check_size(N, Dest, Output, ServerNode, ClientNode) ->
  976:     begin_trace(ServerNode, ClientNode, Dest),
  977:     case Dest of
  978:         {local, _} ->
  979:             ttb_helper:msgs_ip(N);
  980:         _ ->
  981: 	    ttb_helper:msgs(N)
  982:     end,
  983:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([fetch, return_fetch_dir]),
  984:     ttb:format(D, [{out, Output}, {handler, simple_call_handler()}]),
  985:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(Output),
  986:     check_output(N+1, Ret).
  987: 
  988: check_output(Expected, Ret)
  989:   when length(Ret) =:= Expected -> ok;
  990: check_output(Expected, Ret) ->
  991:     io:format("~p~n",[Ret]),
  992:     io:format("Expected ~p got ~p ~n",[Expected, length(Ret)]),
  993:     Expected = length(Ret).
  994: 
  995: fetch_when_no_option_given(suite) ->
  996:     [];
  997: fetch_when_no_option_given(doc) ->
  998:     ["Fetch when no option given"];
  999: fetch_when_no_option_given(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1000:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1001:     {ok, Privdir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1002:     [] = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(Privdir,"ttb_upload_temptest*")),
 1003:     begin_trace(ServerNode, ClientNode, ?FNAME),
 1004:     ttb_helper:msgs(4),
 1005:     stopped = ttb:stop(),
 1006:     [_] = filelib:wildcard(filename:join(Privdir,"ttb_upload_temptest*")).
 1007: 
 1008: fetch_when_no_option_given(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1009:     stop_client_and_server().
 1010:

 1020:     check_size(10, {local, ?FNAME}, ?OUTPUT, ServerNode, ClientNode).

 1178: %% Trace is not affected by changes of cwd on control node or remote nodes during tracing
 1179: %% (three tests)
 1180: changing_cwd_on_control_node(suite) ->
 1181:     [];
 1182: changing_cwd_on_control_node(doc) ->
 1183:     ["Changing cwd on control node during tracing is safe"];
 1184: changing_cwd_on_control_node(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1185:     {ok, OldDir} = file:get_cwd(),
 1186:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1187:     begin_trace(ServerNode, ClientNode, ?FNAME),
 1188:     NumMsgs = 3,
 1189:     ttb_helper:msgs(NumMsgs),
 1190:     ok = file:set_cwd(".."),
 1191:     ttb_helper:msgs(NumMsgs),
 1192:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([fetch, return_fetch_dir]),
 1193:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, simple_call_handler()}]),
 1194:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1195:     check_output(2*(NumMsgs + 1),Ret),
 1196:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir).
 1197: changing_cwd_on_control_node(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1198:     stop_client_and_server().
 1199:

 1211:     ttb_helper:msgs_ip(NumMsgs),
 1212:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([fetch, return_fetch_dir]),
 1213:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, simple_call_handler()}]),
 1214:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1215:     Expected = 2*(NumMsgs + 1),
 1216:     check_output(Expected, Ret),
 1217:     ok = file:set_cwd(OldDir).

 1246: 			  [{server, received, '_', []},
 1247: 			   {client, put, 1, []},
 1248: 			   {client, get, '_', []}],
 1249: 			  {all, call},
 1250: 			  [{file, ?FNAME}]),
 1251:     ttb_helper:msgs(2),
 1252:     {_, D} = ttb:stop(return_fetch_dir),
 1253:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, simple_call_handler()}]),

 1259: dbg_style_fetch(suite) ->
 1260:     [];
 1261: dbg_style_fetch(doc) ->
 1262:     ["Dbg style fetch"];
 1263: dbg_style_fetch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1264:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1265:     DirSize = length(element(2, file:list_dir("."))),
 1266:     ttb:start_trace([ClientNode, ServerNode],
 1267: 			  [{server, received, '_', []},
 1268: 			   {client, put, 1, []},
 1269: 			   {client, get, '_', []}],
 1270: 			  {all, call},
 1271: 			  [{shell, only}]),
 1272:     DirSize = length(element(2, file:list_dir("."))),
 1273:     ttb_helper:msgs(2),
 1274:     DirSize = length(element(2, file:list_dir("."))),
 1275:     stopped, ttb:stop(format),
 1276:     %%+1 -> ttb_last_trace
 1277:     true = (DirSize + 1 == length(element(2, file:list_dir(".")))),
 1278:     {ok,[{all, [{matched,_,_}, {matched,_,_}]}]} =
 1279: 	ttb:start_trace([ClientNode, ServerNode],
 1280: 			[{server, received, '_', []},
 1281: 			 {client, put, 1, []},
 1282: 			 {client, get, '_', []}],
 1283: 			{all, call},
 1284: 			[{shell, only}]),
 1285:     ttb:stop().
 1286: dbg_style_fetch(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1287:     stop_client_and_server().

 1289: shell_tracing_init(suite) ->
 1290:     [];
 1291: shell_tracing_init(doc) ->
 1292:     ["Shell tracing init"];
 1293: shell_tracing_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1294:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1295:     ttb:tracer([ClientNode, ServerNode], shell),
 1296:     ttb:stop(),
 1297:     ttb:tracer([ClientNode, ServerNode],
 1298: 		     [{file, {local, ?FNAME}}, shell]),
 1299:     ttb:stop(),
 1300:     local_client_required_on_shell_tracing =
 1301: 	try  ttb:tracer([ClientNode, ServerNode],[{file, ?FNAME}, shell])
 1302: 	catch
 1303: 	    exit:local_client_required_on_shell_tracing ->
 1304: 		local_client_required_on_shell_tracing
 1305: 	end.

 1307:     stop_client_and_server().

 1358: run_trace_with_shortcut(Shortcut, Ret, F) ->
 1359:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1360:     {ok, _} =
 1361: 	ttb:tracer([ServerNode,ClientNode],[{file, ?FNAME}]),
 1362:     ttb:p(all, call),
 1363:     ttb:F(client, put, Shortcut),
 1364:     ttb_helper:msgs(2),
 1365:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([return_fetch_dir]),
 1366:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, ret_caller_call_handler()}]),
 1367:     {ok, Ret} =file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1368:     stop_client_and_server().

 1371:     {codestr, "fun(_) -> return_trace() end"};

 1373:     {codestr, "fun(_) -> message(false) end"}.

 1395: run_trace_with_shortcut3(suite) ->
 1396:     [];
 1397: run_trace_with_shortcut3(doc) ->
 1398:     ["Run trace with shortcut 3"];
 1399: run_trace_with_shortcut3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1400:     run_trace_with_shortcut(fun_for(return), [ok,ok], tp),
 1401:     run_trace_with_shortcut(fun_for(return), [ok,ok], tpl).
 1402: run_trace_with_shortcut3(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1403:     stop_client_and_server().
 1404: 
 1405: run_trace_with_shortcut4(suite) ->
 1406:     [];
 1407: run_trace_with_shortcut4(doc) ->
 1408:     ["Run trace with shortcut 4"];
 1409: run_trace_with_shortcut4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1410:     run_trace_with_shortcut(fun_for(msg_false), [], tp),
 1411:     run_trace_with_shortcut(fun_for(msg_false), [], tpl).
 1412: run_trace_with_shortcut4(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1413:     stop_client_and_server().
 1414: 
 1415: cant_specify_local_and_flush(suite) ->
 1416:     [];
 1417: cant_specify_local_and_flush(doc) ->
 1418:     ["Can't specify local and flush"];
 1419: cant_specify_local_and_flush(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1420:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1421:     flush_unsupported_with_ip_trace_port =
 1422: 	try ttb:tracer([ServerNode, ClientNode],
 1423: 		       [{flush, 1000}, {file, {local, ?FNAME}}])
 1424: 	catch
 1425: 	    exit:flush_unsupported_with_ip_trace_port ->
 1426: 		flush_unsupported_with_ip_trace_port
 1427: 	end.
 1428: cant_specify_local_and_flush(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1429:     stop_client_and_server().
 1430: 
 1431: trace_sorted_by_default(suite) ->
 1432:     [];
 1433: trace_sorted_by_default(doc) ->
 1434:     ["Trace sorted by default"];
 1435: trace_sorted_by_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1436:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1437:     begin_trace_local(ServerNode, ClientNode, ?FILE),
 1438:     ttb_helper:msgs(2),
 1439:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([return_fetch_dir]),
 1440:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, node_call_handler()}, {disable_sort, false}]),
 1441:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1442:     [ClientNode,ServerNode,ClientNode,ServerNode,ServerNode] = Ret.
 1443: trace_sorted_by_default(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1444:     stop_client_and_server().
 1445: 
 1446: disable_sorting(suite) ->
 1447:     [];
 1448: disable_sorting(doc) ->
 1449:     ["Disable sorting"];
 1450: disable_sorting(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1451:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1452:     begin_trace_local(ServerNode, ClientNode, ?FILE),
 1453:     ttb_helper:msgs(2),
 1454:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([return_fetch_dir]),
 1455:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, node_call_handler()}, {disable_sort, true}]),
 1456:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1457:     [ClientNode,ClientNode,ServerNode,ServerNode,ServerNode] = Ret.
 1458: disable_sorting(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1459:     stop_client_and_server().
 1460:

 1465: trace_resumed_after_node_restart(suite) ->
 1466:     [];
 1467: trace_resumed_after_node_restart(doc) ->
 1468:     ["Test trace resumed after node restart, trace to files on remote node."];
 1469: trace_resumed_after_node_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1470:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1471:     begin_trace_with_resume(ServerNode, ClientNode, ?FNAME),
 1472:     logic(2,6,file).
 1473: trace_resumed_after_node_restart(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1474:     stop_client_and_server().
 1475: 
 1476: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_ip(suite) ->
 1477:     [];
 1478: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_ip(doc) ->
 1479:     ["Test trace resumed after node restart, trace via tcp/ip to local node."];
 1480: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_ip(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1481:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1482:     begin_trace_with_resume(ServerNode, ClientNode, {local, ?FNAME}),
 1483:     logic(2,6,local).
 1484: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_ip(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1485:     stop_client_and_server().
 1486: 
 1487: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap(suite) ->
 1488:     [];
 1489: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap(doc) ->
 1490:     ["Test trace resumed after node restart, wrap option."];
 1491: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1492:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1493:     begin_trace_with_resume(ServerNode, ClientNode, {wrap, ?FNAME, 10, 4}),
 1494:     logic(1,4,file).
 1495: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1496:     stop_client_and_server().
 1497: 
 1498: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap_mult(suite) ->
 1499:     [];
 1500: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap_mult(doc) ->
 1501:     ["Test trace resumed after node restart, wrap option, multiple files."];
 1502: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap_mult(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1503:     {ServerNode, ClientNode} = start_client_and_server(),
 1504:     begin_trace_with_resume(ServerNode, ClientNode, {wrap, ?FNAME, 10, 4}),
 1505:     logic(20,8,file).
 1506: trace_resumed_after_node_restart_wrap_mult(cleanup,_Config) ->
 1507:     stop_client_and_server().
 1508: 
 1509: logic(N, M, TracingType) ->
 1510:     helper_msgs(N, TracingType),
 1511:     test_server:stop_node(ttb_helper:get_node(client)),
 1512:     timer:sleep(2500),
 1513:     {ok,_ClientNode} = test_server:start_node(client,slave,[]),
 1514:     ct:log("client started",[]),
 1515:     ok = ttb_helper:c(code, add_paths, [code:get_path()]),
 1516:     ct:log("paths added",[]),
 1517:     ttb_helper:c(client, init, []),
 1518:     ct:log("client initiated",[]),
 1519:     helper_msgs(N, TracingType),
 1520:     ct:log("helper msgs sent and flushed",[]),
 1521:     {_, D} = ttb:stop([return_fetch_dir]),
 1522:     ct:log("stopped ~p",[D]),
 1523:     ttb:format(D, [{out, ?OUTPUT}, {handler, ret_caller_call_handler2()}]),
 1524:     ct:log("formatted ~p",[{D,?OUTPUT}]),
 1525:     {ok, Ret} = file:consult(?OUTPUT),
 1526:     ct:log("consulted: ~p",[Ret]),
 1527:     check_output(M,Ret).
 1528: 
 1529: begin_trace_with_resume(ServerNode, ClientNode, Dest) ->
 1530:     {ok, _} = ttb:tracer([ServerNode,ClientNode], [{file, Dest}, resume]),
 1531:     ttb:p(all, [call, timestamp]),
 1532:     ttb:tp(server, received, []),
 1533:     ttb:tp(client, put, []),
 1534:     ttb:tp(client, get, []).
 1535: 
 1536: ret_caller_call_handler2() ->
 1537:     {fun(A, {trace_ts, _, call, _, _} ,_,_) -> io:format(A, "ok.~n", []);
 1538: 	(_, _, _, _) -> ok end, []}.
 1539: 
 1540: helper_msgs(N, TracingType) ->
 1541:     case TracingType of
 1542:         local ->
 1543:             ttb_helper:msgs_ip(N);
 1544:         _ ->
 1545:             ttb_helper:msgs(N)
 1546:     end.
 1547: 
 1548: priv_dir(Conf) ->
 1549:     %% Due to problem with long paths on windows => creating a new
 1550:     %% priv_dir under data_dir
 1551:     Dir = filename:absname(filename:join(?config(data_dir, Conf),priv_dir)),
 1552:     filelib:ensure_dir(filename:join(Dir,"*")),
 1553:     Dir.
 1554: 
 1555: clean_priv_dir(Config) ->
 1556:     PrivDir = priv_dir(Config),
 1557:     case filelib:is_dir(PrivDir) of
 1558:         true -> rm(PrivDir);
 1559:         false -> ok
 1560:     end.
 1561: 
 1562: rm(This) ->
 1563:     case filelib:is_dir(This) of
 1564:         true ->
 1565:             {ok,Files} = file:list_dir(This),
 1566:             [rm(filename:join(This,F)) || F <- Files],
 1567: 	    file:del_dir(This);
 1568:         false ->
 1569: 	    file:delete(This)
 1570:     end.
